author: Special Correspondent
text: In a daring robbery, two persons snatched 25 sovereigns of gold jewellery from an aged woman who was walking along PKN Road here on Sunday late afternoon. The police said that I. Puspha (67) was walking on the road in Hussain Colony when an unidentified person intercepted her. Suddenly another person, riding a motorcycle, came close to her. The duo snatched her gold chain. In the melee, the woman fell down on the road and sustained head injuries. She has been admitted to a private hospital. The Sivakasi East police are investigating.
title: Robbery in Sivakasi
